item.title: I need Flume sounds and granular synthesis in Auxy
item.dc:creator: Deru
item.description:
Try messing with offset or free move and play with the spacing of the notes to create that offsetting feel. Hopefully that makes sense. Distortion, chorus are some good tools to manipulate sounds as well

item.description:
